shows.title: Broadway Rhythm & Rhyme
shows.description: Royal Caribbean Singers & Dancers reimagine classics and contemporary hits from Broadway in a witty, original revue.

shows.title: All Access
shows.description: Motown, soul, and pop across four decades with high-energy choreography and dazzling costumes.

shows.title: Tango Buenos Aires
shows.description: A cultural tour of Argentina’s tango—with live musicians (violin, piano, bass, bandoneon) and stylized dance.

guest_entertainers.notes: Rotating headliners vary by sailing; check the app and Cruise Compass.

interactive_events.name: Protect the Egg (Egg Drop Challenge)
interactive_events.description: Teams build contraptions from limited materials to save an egg dropped from a higher deck. Vision-class staple.

interactive_events.name: The Quest (or Crazy Quest)
interactive_events.description: Adults-only scavenger/game show with silly challenges and crowd-driven chaos.

interactive_events.name: Karaoke Nights
interactive_events.description: Passenger sing-alongs with prizes for crowd favorites.

interactive_events.name: Game Shows & Trivia
interactive_events.description: Name-that-tune, Liars Club, and themed trivia in theater or pubs.

themed_parties.name: The Greatest '80s Party Ever
themed_parties.description: Retro dance bash with ‘80s hits, glow sticks, and DJ sets.

themed_parties.name: ’70s Disco Inferno Street Party
themed_parties.description: Bell-bottom vibes and group dances under the stars.

themed_parties.name: Silent Party
themed_parties.description: Headphone disco with multiple channels—choose your vibe.

themed_parties.name: White Hot Night Party
themed_parties.description: All-white attire encouraged; high-energy lasers + beats.

other.name: Live Music & DJ Dance Parties
other.description: From piano sing-alongs to sunset DJ sets with ocean views.

entertainment.planning_notes: Schedules rotate weekly and change with itinerary. For Oct 2025 sailings, check the Royal Caribbean app ~45 days out for reservations and lineups; guest acts are announced closer to embarkation.
